documentation.text:
@dev SafeBet
 Author: Bruno Pedrazza
 It uses [Open Zeppelin Contracts]
 (https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/v4.1.0/)

@dev Function called only when the smart contract is deployed.
 Parameters:
 - address tokenAddress - address of the token to be used to bet and receive claims
 Actions:
 - the transaction's sender will be added in the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.
 - the token will be defined by the parameter tokenAddress

@dev Modifier which verifies if the caller is an owner,
 it means he has the role `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE`.
 The role `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is defined by Open Zeppelin's AccessControl smart contract.
 By default (setted in the constructor) the account which deployed this smart contract is in this role.
 This owner can add / remove other owners.

@dev Modifier which verifies if the caller is a referee,
 it means he has the role `REFEREE_ROLE`.
 Role REFEREE are referred to its `bytes32` identifier,
 defined in the `public constant` called REFEREE_ROLE.
 It should be exposed in the external API and be unique.
 Role REFEREE is used to define which bet option is the winner one.
 This role is responsible for enabling the user's claims.

@dev Modifier which verifies if the caller is a admin,
 it means he has the role `ADMIN_ROLE`.
 Role ADMIN are referred to its `bytes32` identifier,
 defined in the `public constant` called ADMIN_ROLE.
 It should be exposed in the external API and be unique.
 Role ADMIN is used to add/remove bet options.

@dev Function which returns the safebet's contract version.
 This is a fixed value define in source code.
 Parameters: none
 Returns: string

@dev Private function to compare two strings
 and returns `true` if the strings are equal,
 otherwise it returns false.
 Parameters: stringA, stringB
 Returns: bool

@dev This function add an address in the `REFEREE_ROLE`.
 Only owner can call it.
 Can not be called if the contract is paused.
 This role can not be revoked by the owner.
 Parameters: address of referee to be added
 Returns: bool - true if it is sucessful

@dev This function add an address in the `ADMIN_ROLE`.
 Only owner can call it.
 Can not be called if the contract is paused.
 Parameters: address of admin to be added
 Returns: bool - true if it is sucessful

@dev This function excludes an address in the `ADMIN_ROLE`.
 Only owner can call it.
 Can not be called if the contract is paused.
 Parameters: address of admin to be excluded
 Returns: bool - true if it is sucessful

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "can only renounce roles for self"

documentation.text:
@dev This function allows a user to renounce a role
 Parameters: bytes32 role, address account
 Returns: none
 Requirements:
 - An owner can not renounce the role DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.
 - Can only renounce roles for your own account.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "can not revoke yourself in role owner"

arguments.value: can not revoke yourself in role owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "can not revoke yourself in role owner"

documentation.text:
@dev This function allows to revoke a role
 Parameters: bytes32 role, address account
 Returns: none
 Requirements:
 - An owner can not revoke yourself in the role DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.

@dev This function pauses the contract.
 Only owner can call it.
 Parameters: none
 Returns: none
 Requirements:
 - The contract must not be paused.

@dev This function unpauses the contract.
 Only owner can call it.
 Parameters: none
 Returns: none
 Requirements:
 - The contract must be paused.

devdoc.details: SafeBet Author: Bruno Pedrazza It uses [Open Zeppelin Contracts] (https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/v4.1.0/)

addAdmin(address).details: This function add an address in the `ADMIN_ROLE`. Only owner can call it. Can not be called if the contract is paused. Parameters: address of admin to be added Returns: bool - true if it is sucessful

addReferee(address).details: This function add an address in the `REFEREE_ROLE`. Only owner can call it. Can not be called if the contract is paused. This role can not be revoked by the owner. Parameters: address of referee to be added Returns: bool - true if it is sucessful

constructor.details: Function called only when the smart contract is deployed. Parameters: - address tokenAddress - address of the token to be used to bet and receive claims Actions: - the transaction's sender will be added in the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE. - the token will be defined by the parameter tokenAddress

delAdmin(address).details: This function excludes an address in the `ADMIN_ROLE`. Only owner can call it. Can not be called if the contract is paused. Parameters: address of admin to be excluded Returns: bool - true if it is sucessful

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getTokenBalance().details: Returns token balance. Parameters: none Returns: integer amount of tokens in this contract

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

pause().details: This function pauses the contract. Only owner can call it. Parameters: none Returns: none Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: This function allows a user to renounce a role Parameters: bytes32 role, address account Returns: none Requirements: - An owner can not renounce the role DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE. - Can only renounce roles for your own account.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: This function allows to revoke a role Parameters: bytes32 role, address account Returns: none Requirements: - An owner can not revoke yourself in the role DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.

unpause().details: This function unpauses the contract. Only owner can call it. Parameters: none Returns: none Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

version().details: Function which returns the safebet's contract version. This is a fixed value define in source code. Parameters: none Returns: string
